about_the_game:
Join the Discord:

About the Game:

Expand your empire across the galaxy by colonizing unexplored planets, discovering rare resources and artifacts, and defeating your enemies. The player will need to command both ground units for planetary invasions and starships for galactic battles. Multiple game modes and win conditions allow you to play how you want to play, either by galactic domination, espionage, or peaceful diplomacy.

Key Features:


Explore
Chart a course through the vastness of the galaxy as you discover new planets, technology, species, and mysteries of the universe. Every planet provides an opportunity to set up a colony and expand your empire.

Empires Collide - Planetary and Space Combat
Experience the intensity of simultaneous combat on planets and in space. Crush enemy starship fleets, seize control of space stations, and pave the way for a ground assault like never before.

Unearth Ancient Titans
Delve into the mysteries of remote planets and encounter enigmatic Titans. Unleash their unique abilities on the battlefield, gaining a strategic edge that can reshape the course of any conflict.

Weapons of Cosmic Destruction
Unlock and research awe-inspiring weaponry for your capital ships. Rain down devastation on unsuspecting enemies, swiftly claiming dominion over contested planets.

Multiplayer - PvP and Co-Op Modes
Prepare to face worthy adversaries or forge alliances with friends for galactic supremacy. Dive into exhilarating multiplayer action through three captivating modes:

  • Planet Skirmish: Battle fiercely on shared ground until a single victor emerges.
  • Galactic Skirmish: Compete across the cosmic expanse for coveted resources, while eliminating rivals on your path to domination.
  • Co-Op: Join forces with friends to take on the AI and explore the galaxy together.

  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intil Core i3
